title: (x) What is Boston Ultra ripped off from? - Poster Bodoni {Rainer}
content:
hiya,

can anyone tell what this originated as. this is called boston ultra, but is so rough that it, i hope, has been badly copied from something else...

 [‹ (x) Finch logo fat script - Candy Script {Akira}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905085430/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44116 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Cockney Pub, Århus, Denmark - ITC Benguiat, Georgia {Florian, Yves} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905085430/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44113 "Go to next forum topic")
author: ConorW

comments.content: Poster Bodoni seems a better match.

The “Boston” fonts are Poster Bodoni forgeries formerly sold by Weatherly Systems Inc in the USA, and also by Christine Mauerkirchner and Rainer Grunert in Germany, and by other font forging companies.

Open the huge PDF file f31000i.pdf downloadable from my website here

[http://www.sanskritweb.net/forgers/#F31000](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905085430/http:/www.sanskritweb.net/forgers/#F31000 "http://www.sanskritweb.net/forgers/#F31000")

After opening the PDF, search for “Boston”.

(I intentionally do not mention the complete download link here, because this 30,000 rip-off fonts documentation is downloaded like crazy by freaks in gigabyte quantities.)
thanks, poster bodoni it is. that copy really is awful and is getting deleted.
